Smart Sandwich Toaster: A toaster that uses AI technology to suggest sandwich combinations based on your dietary preferences and nutritional goals. It can also track your calorie intake and suggest healthier options if necessary.
Multi-Level Sandwich Toaster: A toaster that has multiple levels to accommodate different types of sandwiches, including thick ones with fillings like cheese or meat.
Sandwich Toaster with Built-In Grill: A toaster that has a built-in grill for grilling sandwiches to perfection. It can also be used to make other grilled foods like burgers or hot dogs.
Sandwich Toaster with Customizable Settings: A toaster that has customizable settings for toasting time, temperature, and even color. This allows users to get the perfect toast every time.

Sandwich Toaster with a Built-In Egg Cooker: A toaster that can also cook eggs in various styles, such as boiled, scrambled, or fried. This makes it a convenient one-stop-shop for breakfast and lunch.
